z: When adding new flags, make comment in issue with flag name!

Features/show_user_guide.description: User guide appears in the "about" menu

Features/can_debug.description: User receives debug info (like the blue sensitivity debug window in editor)

Features/mobile_web.description: Override to force mobile view of site

Features/category_hovers.description: Show hovers/animations on cards in category views

Features/lazy_loading.description: Lazy load various client images, sometimes fetching lower res images first

Features/remix_value.description: Show 'remix value' input in save dialog

View/expr_overlays_fade.description: Opacity to fade newhive overlay to when hovering nearby

View/page_button_opacity.description: Opacity to fade page buttons when hovering nearby

View/expr_overlays_fade_duration.description: How long it takes for overlays on newhives to fade in

View/expr_overlays_fade_out_duration.description: How long it takes for overlays on newhives to fade out

View/bottom_bar.description: New bottom-bar navigation style like new embeds

View/new_embed.description: New click-to-play embed code in embed dialog

UI/top_card.description: Test versions of top card UI

UI/top_card/do_overlaps.description: Show overlapping regions to left and right

UI/top_card/do_full_bleed.description: Show overlaps exending to window edgdes

UI/top_card/card_overlaps.description: Width of overlapping regions to left and right (px)

UI/dim_top_card_hover.description: Dim the UI on the top category card during mouseover

UI/mobile_activity.description: Show activity menu under logo on mobile

Editor/snap_crop.description: Allow snapping when shifting crop bounds of cropped images

Editor/shift_does_raise.description: user can shift-click an app to raise, ctrl-shift-click to lower

Editor/rect_drag_drop.description: user can drag images onto rectangles and images

Editor/copy_table.description: allow dragging of "duplicate" button to create tables of duplicates

Editor/button_options.description: Show the sharing options UI in editor save dialog.

Editor/custom_domain.description: Show the custom domain UI in editor save dialog.

Editor/tile_multiple_images.description: Drag and drop multiple images onto rectangle/image/background tiles the images into space the width of the drop target

Editor/css_classes.description: Let user edit the css class of an app

Editor/autoplay.description: Show the autoplay and autohide controls on audio apps

Editor/anchor_name.description: Show the anchor option for links

Editor/crop_move_border.description: Move the crop region when dragging border

Editor/dev_options.description: Show dropdown under embed for code widgets

Editor/merge_minis.description: Merge the mini selection borders for groups
